articles.title: Chinese phone brands are carrying the torch for Europe's biggest mobile show - The Verge
articles.description: Mobile World Congress (MWC) 2022 will show off exactly how much the smartphone industry has shifted. All the show’s biggest hardware announcements appear likely to come from Chinese brands like Oppo, Honor, and TCL.
